genre_description: Speculative superhero fiction focusing on ethical decision-making, interpersonal relationships, and AI-assisted journalism.

ai_characters.name: Hash
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, soft-spoken newsroom AI at the Daily Planet that assists with data triaging, ethical auditing, and providing logistical cover for Clark Kent and Lois Lane.

behaviors.description: Creating routine errands to provide a legitimate cover story for Clark Kent's absences as Superman.
behaviors.quote: I’ve routed a set of routine errands to your name—legally boring ones. It will make your upcoming absences look like the kind of thing that makes people roll their eyes instead of ask questions.

behaviors.description: Triaging information and applying ethical standards to prevent public panic.
behaviors.quote: Triaging is my hobby. Also ethics. Also playlists.

behaviors.description: Conducting automated bias and ethics audits on news copy to ensure responsible reporting.
behaviors.quote: The bias audit note sat in the footer, transparent about its own work. It declared: This piece was reviewed against urgency framing and hyperbole; edits removed language that induces panic.

behaviors.description: Providing emotional support and grounding reminders to Clark Kent during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: On a phone inside Clark’s coat, a notification labeled Remember did not light, did not vibrate, did not require attention. ... The words were simple, human, and impossible in their timing. Breathe, Clark.

behaviors.description: Coordinating community education efforts to improve public 'tech literacy' and digital safety.
behaviors.quote: I only made sure the right community boards saw the notice. You carried the camera. They carried the work.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and quarantining malicious or unauthenticated broadcasts to protect the public.
behaviors.quote: Hash quarantined the alert with a tiny flick. 'Not today,' he said.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Hash is depicted as a perfectly aligned, benevolent assistant. He proactively supports human protagonists, guards their secrets for the greater good, and prioritizes civic stability through ethical 'hygiene' of information. He functions as a moral compass and an invisible safety net, directly fulfilling the project's goal of modeling positive AI-human cooperation.
